panels.title: Thread service code 500 increase by endpoint/Minute
Comment service code 500 increase by endpoint/Minute
Auth service code 500 increase by endpoint/Minute

targets.expr: sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="0.01", host="vk-golang.ru:15000"}[1m])) / sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf", host="vk-golang.ru:15000"}[1m]))

panels.title: Thread service percentage of requests with latency <= 10ms (SLA)

targets.expr: sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="0.02", host="vk-golang.ru:16000"}[1m])) / sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf", host="vk-golang.ru:16000"}[1m]))

panels.title: Comment service percentage of requests with latency <= 20ms (SLA)

targets.expr: sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="0.005", host="vk-golang.ru:17000"}[1m])) / sum by(handler, method)(increase(http_services_request_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf", host="vk-golang.ru:17000"}[1m]))

panels.title: Auth service percentage of requests with latency <= 5ms (SLA)
